name: FINDER Toolbox
description: FINDER Toolbox allows an easy programming of FINDER devices with your smartphone via NFC (Near Field Communication) or BLUETOOTH.  Help us serve you better. Use the form at https://www.findernet.com/en/worldwide/contact/app_assistance to send us your suggestions or report any problems. FINDER Toolbox provides all technical data sheets and informs you about all news.   - BLUETOOTH -  Finder TOOLBOX is a tool created for the installer and allows you to configure the YESLY system quickly and easily. It allows to program / rename / delete devices, to associate smartphone and wireless buttons and to share data with the end user.  Thanks to YESLY you can, Switch ON, OFF and dim lamps, roll up/down the electric shutters and create custom SCENARIOs. This is YESLY comfort living.  The device: Type 13.72 - Bluetooth multifunction relay Type 13.22 - Bluetooth multifunction relay Type 13.S2 - Bluetooth shutter actuator Type 15.71 - Bluetooth Dimmer Type 15.21 - Bluetooth Dimmer Type 1Y.P2 - Interfaccia Input  For more informations visit us at http://yesly.life or http://findernet.com.   - NFC (Near Field Communication) - With FINDER Toolbox you can program via NFC: Type 12.51: Digital time switch, Daily/Weekly programming Type 12.81: Digital astro-switch Type 12.61: Digital weekly time switch, 1 pole Type 12.62: Digital weekly time switch, 2 pole Type 12.A1: Weekly Astro time switch 1 pole Type 12.A2: Weekly Astro time switch 2 pole Type 84.02: SMARTimer multifunction with display, 2 channels  - BLUETOOTH - With FINDER Toolbox you can program via BLUETOOTH: Type 18.51.8230.B300: PIR movement and presence detector
